We must claim His sufficiency. Christ has died for us. Satan says, "You are a sinner and cannot make yourself any better." Yes, I am a sinner, and I need a Saviour, and I lay hold of the merits of Jesus Christ to save 


                                    -248- 

me from all transgression. We wash in the fountain that has been prepared for us, and we are cleansed from all the defilement of sin.
